name: Cr-gfcodebot-twitter
tagline: lists all gift codes that were posted for @crunchyroll_de on twitter with a range of seven days
body:
This application lists gift codes for @crunchyroll_de on Twitter.

## IMPORTANT
You have to change login.rb so that the login data matches your personal API access credentials.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
